summary: This is an email exchange from October 27, 2020, regarding an invitation from the DOJ to Epstein victims. The sender is checking if the recipient received an invite on behalf of their clients and asking for confirmation of attendance and any missing names.

events.title: DOJ Invitation to Epstein Victims
events.description: An invitation was sent by the DOJ to victims of Jeffrey Epstein, and a follow-up email was sent to confirm receipt and attendance.

keyFacts: The DOJ sent an invitation to Epstein victims in October 2020.
A follow-up email was sent to confirm receipt of the invitation and attendance.
The email exchange is external and marked as such, indicating communication between parties outside the DOJ.
